title: 服务器出现If you wish to use IP forwarding, please enable it in your BungeeCo...
author: 使擎之魔
txt_content: 把BC端里的子服单独拿出来开，显示 If you wish to use IP forwarding, please enable it in your BungeeCord config as well! 怎么解决？

replies.author: 隔壁柴先生
replies.txt_content: 如一楼所述，打开服务端文件夹打开spigot.yml文件  找到BungeeCord=true  将true修改为false即可
